name: InsaneNight
description:
A nightmare, where you have to fight with a creature that creates ghosts that chase you. This creature can also lift beds and move them with the rhythm of piano notes.

Your goal is to avoid being crushed by the beds, and destroy the ghosts until you reach the creature and destroy it.

Controls:

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Up Arrow - Jump

Spacebar - Attack
